overview: Lovely Evil Angel director/performer Dana Vespoli is a multi-talented woman, both behind and in front of the camera. With the release of "Lesbian Anal P.O.V. 2," you might even say she's got her fingers in many pies! This intense, first person view into the sweet asses of Dana's favorite girls is filled with creative perversity and lots of slow-burning passion.
title: Lesbian Anal P.O.V. 2
